entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone who has been offered the post of Minister three times and has returned to Hogwarts. He is described as unsmiling and taking a sip of wine.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who is often asked for advice by the Ministry and has been offered the post of Minister three times. He is described as waiting with a look of pleasant expectancy for Voldemort to talk first.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as an organization that often asks Dumbledore for advice and has offered him the post of Minister three times.

entities.name: professor dippet
entities.description: Professor Dippet is mentioned as someone who expected Voldemort to return earlier than he did.

relationships.description: Voldemort has a relationship with the Ministry, as he has been offered the post of Minister three times.
The Ministry asks Dumbledore for advice, as mentioned in the text.
Voldemort has a request from Professor Dippet, as he is requesting something that was previously told to him.
